code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Infra_WorkerNode] --> AuthInitial

    state "AuthCubit States" as AuthFlow {Infra_WorkerNode)
        AuthLoading --> AuthSuccess: loginSuccess(Infra_RedisCache)
        AuthLoading --> AuthFailure: loginError(Infra_EtcdCluster)
        AuthSuccess --> AuthLoading: logout(Infra_IngressController)
        AuthSuccess --> ProfileUpdating: updateProfile(Infra_WorkerNode)
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthSuccess: updateSuccess(Infra_WorkerNode)
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthFailure: updateError(Infra_LoadBalancer)
        AuthFailure --> AuthLoading: retry(Infra_LoadBalancer)
        AuthLoading --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]: dispose(Infra_RedisCache)
    }

    [Infra_LoadBalancer] --> CortesInitial

    state "CortesCubit States" as CortesFlow {Infra_LoadBalancer)
        CortesLoading --> CortesLoaded: loadSuccess(Infra_IngressController)
        CortesLoading --> CortesError: loadError(Infra_WorkerNode)
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoaded: selectSegmento(Infra_EtcdCluster)
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoading: refreshCortes(Infra_LoadBalancer)
        CortesError --> CortesLoading: retry(Infra_EtcdCluster)
        CortesLoading --> [Infra_IngressController]: dispose(Infra_RedisCache)
    }

    [Infra_LoadBalancer] --> QuizInitial

    state "QuizCubit States" as QuizFlow {Infra_WorkerNode)
        QuizLoading --> QuizLoaded: quizGenerated(Infra_IngressController)
        QuizLoading --> QuizError: generationError(Infra_LoadBalancer)
        QuizLoaded --> QuizLoaded: submitAnswer(Infra_WorkerNode)
        QuizLoaded --> QuizFinished: completeQuiz(Infra_IngressController)
        QuizError --> QuizLoading: retry(Infra_LoadBalancer)
        QuizFinished --> QuizInitial: reset(Infra_LoadBalancer)
        QuizLoading --> [Infra_IngressController]: dispose(Infra_EtcdCluster)
    }
